text: Giancarlo Giannini (; born 1 August 1942) is an Italian actor and voice-over artist. In 1976, he starred in Seven Beauties, for which he was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor. He dubbed Jack Nicholson's voice in the Italian release of both The Shining and Batman; he is the official Italian dubber of Al Pacino. In 2009, Giannini received a star on the Italian Walk of Fame in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.Connor, Kevin."Walking proud in Little Italy" ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Actors who played in James Bond movies Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:People from La Spezia
title: Giancarlo Giannini
